question: IEM Cologne: MOUZ vs. Liquid
description:
MOUZ and Liquid are scheduled to play each other in the IEM Cologne 2025 Tournament on July 27, 2025.

This market will resolve to “MOUZ” if MOUZ wins against Liquid the best of 3 matchup of the EM Cologne Tournament.

This market will resolve to “Liquid” if Liquid wins against MOUZ in the best of 3 matchup of the EM Cologne Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from HLTV: https://www.hltv.org/events/8038/iem-cologne-2025.

question: ATP Washington D.C – Davidovich Fokina vs. De Minaur
description:
This is a polymarket on the final match between Alejandro Davidovich Fokina and Alex de Minaur in the 2025 ATP Washington D.C. men’s singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Fokina” if Alejandro Davidovich Fokina advances against Alex de Minaur.
This market will resolve to “De Minaur” if Alex de Minaur advances against Alejandro Davidovich Fokina.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $117K on July 28 at 5PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: Bitcoin Price - July 28, 5PM ET
events.description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: League of Legends: LGD Gaming vs. EDward Gaming
description:
LGD Gaming and EDward Gaming are scheduled to play each other in the League of Legends LPL League on July 28, 2025.

This market will resolve to “LGD Gaming” if LGD Gaming wins against EDward Gaming in their matchup of the LPL League.

This market will resolve to “EDward Gaming” if EDward Gaming wins against LGD Gaming in their matchup of the LPL League.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50‑50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from parascore (https://www.parascore.com/).
